semantic_identifier: [GOLD-60]: Fix sales initiation prioritization to correctly consume Customer_Analyzer fit scores
title: Fix sales initiation prioritization to correctly consume Customer_Analyzer fit scores

sections.text: Sales initiation recommendations are not reliably prioritizing accounts based on Customer_Analyzer fit scores, causing incorrect ordering in the MVP rule-based list. Update the prioritization logic to fetch and apply the latest fit score per account and fall back gracefully when a score is missing. Add a minimal regression test covering score present/missing scenarios to prevent future ranking drift.
